rooms.description: Spacious living room with minimalistic furnishings and large floor-to-ceiling windows that provide ample natural light while maintaining privacy.
Dining area integrated within the living space for communal dining experiences.
Modern kitchen with open shelving and large windows to ensure ventilation and bright interiors in keeping with Vastu principles.
Primary bedroom featuring a spacious balcony for relaxation and fresh air. The room includes floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring adequate light while keeping privacy intact.
Secondary bedroom with a private balcony and floor-to-ceiling windows for optimum brightness as per Vastu guidelines.
Attached bathroom to the primary bedroom ensuring convenience and adherence to privacy norms.
Bathroom for the secondary bedroom offering similar design elements.

openings.description: Durable entrance door with minimalistic, industrial finishes to match the Brutalist aesthetic.
Large floor-to-ceiling windows that provide natural light and an open feel in all rooms as per design brief.

design_style: Brutalist farmhouse with a penthouse layout
comments: The design incorporates Vastu principles by ensuring proper ventilation and alignment of windows for optimal light. The use of floor-to-ceiling windows meets the requirement while enhancing the modern aesthetic of the space.
